text.div:
ParticipationStatus

The Participation status of an appointment

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/participationstatus

CodeDisplayDefinition
accepted The participant has accepted the appointment.
declined The participant has declined the appointment.
tentative The participant has tentative the appointment.
in-process The participant has in-process the appointment.
completed The participant has completed the appointment.
needs-action The participant has needs-action the appointment.

name: ParticipationStatus
description: The Participation status of an appointment

concept.definition: The participant has accepted the appointment.
The participant has declined the appointment.
The participant has tentative the appointment.
The participant has in-process the appointment.
The participant has completed the appointment.
The participant has needs-action the appointment.
